title: Electronics Fundamentals
description: Master the basics of electronics. This course covers circuit theory, components, and introductory electronics concepts.

title: Advanced PCB Design
description: Dive into the intricacies of PCB design. Learn advanced techniques, layout considerations, and industry best practices.

title: Microcontroller Programming
description: Explore the world of microcontrollers. This course guides you through programming and interfacing microcontrollers for various applications.
